rules.file:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:g="http://www.backbase.com/2008/gadget" xml:lang="en">

<head>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="scripts/browser-support.js"></script>
    <title>Static Navigation Widget</title>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" />
    <meta name="author" content="Backbase" />
    <script type="text/javascript" src="scripts/angular-cookiesv1.2.28.min.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript" src="scripts/navigation.js"></script>
    <g:preferences>
        <g:preference name="navStartResolver" label="Navigation Type" type="select-one" default="fixed">
            <g:enumeration label="Fixed root" value="fixed" />
            <g:enumeration label="Contextual root (relative)" value="relativeContextual" />
            <g:enumeration label="Contextual root (absolute)" value="fixedContextual" />
        </g:preference>
        <g:preference name="uuid" label="Navigation root" type="text" default="" />
        <g:preference name="distance" label="Navigation root" type="select-one" default="1">
            <g:enumeration label="1 level up" value="1" />
            <g:enumeration label="2 levels up" value="2" />
            <g:enumeration label="3 levels up" value="3" />
            <g:enumeration label="4 levels up" value="4" />
            <g:enumeration label="5 levels up" value="5" />
            <g:enumeration label="6 levels up" value="6" />
            <g:enumeration label="7 levels up" value="7" />
            <g:enumeration label="8 levels up" value="8" />
            <g:enumeration label="9 levels up" value="9" />
            <g:enumeration label="10 levels up" value="10" />
            <g:enumeration label="All levels" value="-1" />
        </g:preference>
        <g:preference name="rootLevel" label="Navigation root" type="select-one" default="0">
            <g:enumeration label="Top level" value="0" />
            <g:enumeration label="level 1" value="1" />
            <g:enumeration label="level 2" value="2" />
            <g:enumeration label="level 3" value="3" />
            <g:enumeration label="level 4" value="4" />
            <g:enumeration label="level 5" value="5" />
            <g:enumeration label="level 6" value="6" />
            <g:enumeration label="level 7" value="7" />
            <g:enumeration label="level 8" value="8" />
            <g:enumeration label="level 9" value="9" />
            <g:enumeration label="level 10" value="10" />
        </g:preference>
        <g:preference name="depth" label="Depth" type="select-one" default="1">
            <g:enumeration label="1 Level" value="1" />
            <g:enumeration label="2 Levels" value="2" />
            <g:enumeration label="3 Levels" value="3" />
            <g:enumeration label="4 Levels" value="4" />
            <g:enumeration label="5 Levels" value="5" />
            <g:enumeration label="6 Levels" value="6" />
        </g:preference>
        <g:preference name="template" label="Template"
        type="select-one" default="$(itemRoot)/templates/default/mustache_top_level.html">
            <g:enumeration label="Default" value="$(itemRoot)/templates/default/mustache_top_level.html" />
            <g:enumeration label="BH_Nav_Dealer" value="$(itemRoot)/templates/nav-dealer/mustache_top_level.html" />
            <g:enumeration label="BH_Nav_Footer" value="$(itemRoot)/templates/nav-footer/mustache_top_level.html" />
            <g:enumeration label="BH_Nav_Customer" value="$(itemRoot)/templates/nav-customer/mustache_top_level.html" />
            <g:enumeration label="BH_Nav_Hamburger" value="$(itemRoot)/templates/hamburger/mustache_top_level.html" />
            <g:enumeration label="BH_NavCookie" value="$(itemRoot)/templates/cookie/cookie.html" />
            <g:enumeration label="BH_Error" value="$(itemRoot)/templates/unsupported-browser/error.html" />
            <g:enumeration label="BH_Docs_Navigation" value="$(itemRoot)/templates/docs-navigation/mustache-docs-navigation.html" />
        </g:preference>
    </g:preferences>
</head>

<body class="widget-navigation row"
 g:onload="requireWidget(__WIDGET__,'scripts/main'); b$.universal.widgets.NavigationWidget.start(__WIDGET__);"
 ng-controller="MainCtrl as mainCtrl">
    <g:model objectType="link" renderer="advancedNav">
        <g:param name="navStartResolver" value="${navStartResolver}" />
        <g:param name="uuid" value="${uuid}" />
        <g:param name="rootLevel" value="${rootLevel}" />
        <g:param name="distance" value="${distance}" />
        <g:param name="depth" value="${depth}" />
        <g:param name="showParent" value="${showParent}" />
        <g:param name="useGeneratedUrl" value="false" />
        <g:template value="${template}" />
    </g:model>
</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
   <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:g="http://www.backbase.com/2008/gadget"

         <g:enumeration label="LA-Marketing Card Bulleted Carousel"
                        value="$(contextRoot)/static/features/[BBHOST]/widget-content-templates/templates/marketing-bulleted-list-carousel.html" />
         <g:enumeration label="LA-Marketing Card Bulleted"                     
                       value="$(contextRoot)/static/features/[BBHOST]/widget-content-templates/templates/marketing-bulleted-list-carousel-withoutCTA.html" />
         <g:enumeration label="LA-Marketing Card Bulleted NoPagin"                     
                       value="$(contextRoot)/static/features/[BBHOST]/widget-content-templates/templates/marketing-bulleted-list-carousel-nopagin.html" />
         <g:enumeration label="LA-Hero Image Back Arrow"
                        value="$(contextRoot)/static/features/[BBHOST]/widget-content-templates/templates/funding-hero-image.html" />
      </g:preference>
      <g:preference name="bgImageContainer" label="Background position" type="select-one"
         default="widget">
         <g:enumeration label="Widget" value="widget" />
         <g:enumeration label="Fullscreen" value="fullscreen" />
      </g:preference>
      <g:preference name="bgImageSize" type="select-one" default="auto">
         <g:enumeration label="Auto" value="auto" />
         <g:enumeration label="Contain" value="contain" />
         <g:enumeration label="Cover" value="cover" />
         <g:enumeration label="Full" value="100% 100%" />
      </g:preference>
      <g:preference name="bgImageScroll" label="Background Scroll" type="select-one" default="scroll">
         <g:enumeration label="Scroll" value="scroll" />
         <g:enumeration label="Fixed" value="fixed" />
      </g:preference>
   </g:preferences>
   </head>
   <body g:onload="requireWidget(__WIDGET__, 'scripts/main')" class="widget-advanced-content-template-body-lloyd">
      <div class="widget-content widget-advanced-content-template">
         <g:include proxy="false" src="$(contextRoot)/contenttemplates/rendered">
            <g:http-param name="contextItemName" value="__WIDGET__.model.contextItemName" />
            <g:http-param name="uuid" value="__WIDGET__.model.uuid" />
        </g:include>
    </div>
</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:g="http://www.backbase.com/2008/gadget" xml:lang="en">

<head>
    <meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/xml; charset=UTF-8" />
    <g:preferences>
        <g:preference name="template" label="Template" type="select-one"
        default="$(itemRoot)/templates/search.html">
            <g:enumeration label="Large" value="$(itemRoot)/templates/search-large.html" />
            <g:enumeration label="Small" value="$(itemRoot)/templates/search-small.html" />
        </g:preference>
    </g:preferences>
</head>

<body g:onload="requireWidget(__WIDGET__,'scripts/main')" ng-controller="MainCtrl as ctrl" class="widget-search ng-cloak">
    <g:model objectType="link" renderer="advancedNav">
        <g:template value="${template}" />
    </g:model>
</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xml:lang="en" xmlns:g="http://www.backbase.com/2008/gadget">

<head>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" />
    <title>Advanced Navbar</title>
    <g:preferences>
        <g:preference name="navRoot" label="Navigation Root Link" type="text"
        viewHint="text-input,manager,designModeOnly" />
        <g:preference name="showParent" label="Show navigation root" type="boolean"
        viewHint="checkbox,manager,designModeOnly" />
        <g:preference name="navDepth" label="Navigation Depth" type="select-one"
        default="1" viewHint="select-one,manager,designModeOnly">
            <g:enumeration label="One Level" value="1" />
            <g:enumeration label="Two Levels" value="2" />
            <g:enumeration label="Three Levels" value="3" />
        </g:preference>
        <g:preference name="navTemplate" label="Template" type="select-one"
        default="$(contextRoot)/static/widgets/[BBHOST]/widget-navbar-advanced/templates/mustache_top_level.html"
            viewHint="select-one,manager,designModeOnly">
            <g:enumeration label="Landing Navigation"
            value="$(contextRoot)/static/widgets/[BBHOST]/widget-navbar-advanced/templates/mustache_top_level.html" />
            <g:enumeration label="Dealer Sub Navigation"
            value="$(contextRoot)/static/widgets/[BBHOST]/widget-navbar-advanced/templates/mustache_dlr_sub_nav.html" />
            <g:enumeration label="Customer Sub Navigation"
            value="$(contextRoot)/static/widgets/[BBHOST]/widget-navbar-advanced/templates/mustache_cust_sub_nav.html" />
        </g:preference>
        <g:preference name="scrollSetting" label="Page Scroll settings" type="select-one"
        viewhint="select-one,manager,designModeOnly">
            <g:enumeration value="normal" label="Normal" />
            <g:enumeration value="transparency" label="Transparency" />
            <g:enumeration value="hide-show" label="Hide/Show" />
        </g:preference>
        <g:preference name="launcherIcon" label="Icon for Launcher Menu" type="select-one"
        viewhint="select-one,manager,designModeOnly">
            <g:enumeration value="arrow-left" label="Arrow left" />
            <g:enumeration value="list" label="List" />
        </g:preference>
        <g:preference name="containerType" label="Container type" type="select-one"
        viewhint="select-one,manager,designModeOnly">
            <g:enumeration value="fixed" label="Fixed" />
            <g:enumeration value="fluid" label="Fluid" />
        </g:preference>
    </g:preferences>
</head>

<body g:onload="requireWidget(__WIDGET__, 'scripts/main')" class="widget-navbar-advanced" ng-controller="NavBarAdvancedController as mainCtrl">
    <g:model objectType="link" renderer="advancedNav" class="clearfix">
        <g:param name="depth" value="${navDepth}" />
        <g:param name="showParent" value="${showParent}" />
        <g:param name="uuid" value="${navRoot}" />
        <g:param name="active" value="0" />
        <g:param name="useGeneratedUrl" value="false" />
        <!-- 'true' to use generated url -->
        <g:template value="${navTemplate}" />
    </g:model>
</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:g="http://www.backbase.com/2008/gadget" xml:lang="en">

<head>
    <title>widget-register</title>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/xml; charset=UTF-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
    <g:preferences>
        <g:preference name="template" label="Template" type="select-one" default="$(itemRoot)/templates/register.html">
            <g:enumeration label="Register Mobile"
            value="$(itemRoot)/templates/register.html" />
            <g:enumeration label="Register Desktop"
            value="$(itemRoot)/templates/register-desktop.html" />
        </g:preference>
    </g:preferences>
</head>

<body g:onload="requireWidget(__WIDGET__, 'scripts/main')" class="lp-Register ng-cloak" ng-controller="MainCtrl as mainCtrl">
    <g:model objectType="link" renderer="advancedNav">
        <g:template value="${template}" />
    </g:model>
</body>

</html>
